summary: AN ORDINANCE implementing a court order regarding the City Light Department's funding of the City's One Percent for Art program; appropriating funds to Finance General to reimburse the Light Fund for expenditures on certain public art projects; transferring jurisdiction of certain art projects from the City Light Department to the Office of Arts and Cultural Affairs; and appropriating funds to the Office of Arts and Cultural Affairs to refund certain moneys contributed by the City Light Department to the Municipal Arts Fund; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
